title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Nakshi Haaram with Pearl Drop
features: Intricate floral Nakshi work showcasing traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The necklace features a graduated floral design with alternating emerald and diamond motifs. The pendant is a large, elaborately designed floral medallion with a central emerald and a delicate pearl drop, adding a touch of timeless elegance. The setting ensures maximum brilliance and security for the precious gemstones.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green emeralds
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
and traditional ceremonies like Seemantham or Half-Saree Functions. Also suitable for high-end parties and special events where a touch of heritage is desired.
description: This exquisite Haaram blends traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The vibrant emeralds and brilliant diamonds create a captivating sparkle, while the lustrous pearl adds a touch of grace. It's a heirloom-quality piece that can be cherished for generations, embodying the rich cultural heritage of Andhra Pradesh. The Nakshi craftsmanship reflects the superior artistry of Hyderabad's finest jewelers.
